name: European Advertising Standards Alliance
membership: EASA is member of the ICC Belgium (International Chamber of Commerce Belgium)
goal: The European Advertising Standards Alliance (EASA) is the single authoritative voice on advertising self-regulation issues and promotes high ethical standards in commercial communications by means of effective self-regulation. As a non-profit organisation based in Brussels, it brings together national advertising self-regulatory organisations (SROs) and organisations representing the advertising industry in Europe and beyond.
interests: Business and Industry, Communication, Competition, Consumers, Culture, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Education and training, Environment, Food Safety, Institutional affairs, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Single market, Youth
euInitiatives: Community of Practice for Better Co- and Self-regulation, UCPD, MCAD, AVMSD, Data Privacy, Consumer Protection, CPC Regulation, Alcohol and Health Forum, The EU Platform for Action on Diet, Physical Activity and Health, Data Protection, Cosmetics, Gender Stereotyping, New Deal for Consumers, Fake News and Online Disinformation, eCommerce, Consumer Credit Directive, Influencer Marketing.
